boardgame.name: The Manhattan Project: Chain Reaction
The Manhattan Project: Chain Reaction – Deluxe Edition
Projekt Manhattan: Reakcja Łańcuchowa
boardgame.description: The world is again threatened with war! As the War Minister of your small nation, you have been tasked with confronting aggression by developing atomic bombs for your country. Your spies have stolen the needed technology, but you need to acquire the materials and personnel to get the job done before your rival nations do. Once someone has built 10 megatons of bombs, the final round will finish, and the player with the most bombs will win, their nation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s survival assured!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To do this, you will be playing cards representing the training and use of teams of laborers, scientists, and engineers to complete various plans, until you have assembled enough bombs to win!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Stand alone game based on the popular _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Manhattan Project_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; board game by Minion Games, this is a simpler card-only game using dual-purpose cards in a quick and exciting race to completion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #24: The HYPE Episode! Gen Con 2016 Preview; Rocky Road a la Mode preview; Among the Stars on tap
Episode 3: The one about the ending of a partnership and women in gaming
Origins, Cruises, CMON Interview, and Philip played Spyfall - Boards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Swords #83

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Deluxe version with the wooden bits. New in Shrink
Opened but never played.
Kickstarter Edition Out of shrink, and all components punched, sorted, and/or bagged, but NEVER PLAYED. Comes from a smoke-free, pet-free home. $6.80 SHIPPING (CONUS only).
Game is NIS
Played once, excellent condition Deluxe Edition
